item.title: Dangerous storm strikes Southern California: Latest
item.description: A storm is dropping rounds of heavy rain on more than 22 million people across Southern California on Saturday.

item.title: WATCH: Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
item.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.

item.title: Officer critically injured in Vance motorcade crash
item.description: A police officer in the Maryville Police Department's motor unit was critically injured in a crash with a state trooper, officials said.
